channel.title: About the Resources category
channel.description:
Use the **Resources** category to post lists or other collections of external resources, as opposed to conversational discussion.
Long-form discussion should go in other OGM categories.
Feel free to make your post a [wiki post](https://meta.discourse.org/t/what-is-a-wiki-post/30801), if you'd like your resource list to be editable by anyone.
Have fun, and thank you for your contributions!
